verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedars,<s%> but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> remains <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>
Then <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is with you.
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> You shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> me an <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in:

For I have not <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in an <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5927>brought<s%> up <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> but have <S%H1961>gone<s%> from <S%H168>tent<s%> to <S%H168>tent,<s%> and from one <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> to another.

<S%H3605>Wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> I a <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you not <S%H1129>built<s%> me an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedars?<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> you from the <S%H5116>sheepcote,<s%> even from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> that you should be <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And I have <S%H1961>been<s%> with you <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have walked, and have <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> you a <S%H8034>name<s%> like the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> men that are in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Also I will <S%H7760>ordain<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them, and they shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H8478>place,<s%> and shall be <S%H7264>moved<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H1086>waste<s%> them any <S%H3254>more,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>beginning,<s%>

And since the <S%H3117>time<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Moreover I will <S%H3665>subdue<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Furthermore I <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> you an <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4390>expired<s%> that you must <S%H3212>go<s%> to be with your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> shall be of your <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>
He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> me an <S%H1004>house,<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

I will be his <S%H25>father,<s%> and he shall be my <S%H1121>son:<s%> and I will not <S%H5493>take<s%> my <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from him, as I <S%H5493>took<s%> it from him that was <S%H6440>before<s%> you:

But I will <S%H5975>settle<s%> him in my <S%H1004>house<s%> and in my <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> for ever <S%H5769>more.<s%>

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2377>vision,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> did <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> am I, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4310>what<s%> is my <S%H1004>house,<s%> that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> me till <S%H1988>now?<s%>

And yet <S%H2063>this<s%> was a <S%H6994>small<s%> thing in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> for you have also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> for a <S%H7350>great<s%> while to come, and have <S%H7200>regarded<s%> me according to the <S%H8448>estate<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H4608>high<s%> degree, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> can <S%H1732>David<s%> speak <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> to you for the <S%H3519>honor<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant?<s%> for you <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H5668>sake,<s%> and according to your own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> in making <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these <S%H1420>great<s%> things.

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> you, <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> you, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> to be his own <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> you a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1420>greatness<s%> and <S%H3372>terribleness,<s%> by <S%H1644>driving<s%> out <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> your people <S%H5971><s%><S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>
For your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did you <S%H5414>make<s%> your own <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H5769>ever;<s%> and you, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> let the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said.<s%>

Let it even be <S%H539>established,<s%> that your <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even a <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

For you, O my <S%H430>God,<s%> have <S%H1540>told<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> that you will <S%H1129>build<s%> him an <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you.
And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you are <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2896>goodness<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant:<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore let it <S%H2974>please<s%> you to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that it may be <S%H6440>before<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> for you <S%H1288>bless,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and it shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
